name: totemistic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving belief in a relationship between a group of people and a respected physical object, or relating to the practices and ceremonies connected with such a belief: Early humans gave their lives meaning through totemistic rituals. These rock paintings are probably related to a totemistic belief system.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is possible that these carvings possessed some mystical or totemistic significance.It is not uncommon to find magical and totemistic motifs in these tapestries.Totemistic religion gives meaning to a social group through a powerful symbolic object.My mother had a strong belief in the totemistic quality of the family treasures.
